jcr:content.jcr:title: Western Pomerania Lagoon Area National Park

contentheadline.headline: Western Pomerania Lagoon Area National Park

contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox protected area | name = Western Pomerania Lagoon Area National Park | alt_name = Nationalpark Vorpommersche Boddenlandschaft | iucn_category = II | photo = NP Vorp. Boddenlandschaft.JPG | photo_caption = Coastal vegetation | location = [[Mecklenburg-Vorpommern]], [[Germany]] | nearest_city = [[Rostock]], [[Stralsund]] | map = Germany | relief = 1 | lat_d = 54.4667 | lat_m = | lat_s = | lat_NS = N | long_d = 12.9 | long_m = | long_s = | long_EW = E | area = 805 km² | established = 1 October 1990 | visitation_num = | visitation_year = | governing_body = }} The '''Western Pomerania Lagoon Area National Park'''<ref>[http://www.naturefund.de/en/earth/nature_news/article/article/western-pomerania-lagoon-area-national-park.html ''Western Pomerania Lagoon Area''] at www.naturefund.de. Accessed on 27 Jun 12.</ref> (''Nationalpark Vorpommersche Boddenlandschaft'') is [[Mecklenburg-Vorpommern]]'s largest national park situated at the coast of the [[Baltic Sea]]. It consists of several peninsulas, islands and lagoon shore areas in the [[Baltic Sea]], belonging to the district of [[Vorpommern-Rügen]]. The national park includes: * the [[Darss|Darß]] peninsula * the western coast of the island of [[Rügen]] * the island of [[Hiddensee]] * the island of [[Ummanz]] * several tiny islets between the above places * the multiple lagoons in between the landmasses The national park is characterised by very shallow water housing a unique coastal fauna. All portions of the national park are famous for being a resting place for tens of thousands of [[crane (bird)|crane]]s and [[goose|geese]]. Its area is 805 km². == Composition == Approximately half the area of the park is open Baltic Sea; more than another quarter covers parts of the lagoons in the [[Darss-Zingst Bodden Chain]] including the [[West Rügen Bodden]]. Thus it protects these shallow water areas (in the Baltic Sea, the National Park boundary is based on the ten-metre depth contour) with their rich flora and fauna. The differing salt content of the [[brackish]] water habitats of the Baltic and the ''[[bodden]]'' (shallow lagoons) contribute significantly to the local diversity of nature. For example, the [[Atlantic Herring|Baltic Herring]] visits the shallow bays regualarly spawn here. The territory of the national park includes parts of the [[Darß]] and the peninsula of [[Zingst]] as well as most of the island of [[Hiddensee]]. In addition, a narrow strip of land on the island of [[Rügen]], next to the ''bodden'' lies within the national park. Pine and beech woods, such as the [[Darß Forest]], cover much of the land. In treeless areas there are [[bog]]s, resulting from coastal flooding. == References == {{Reflist}} == Sources == * {{internetquelle |autor= |hrsg= Landesamt für Forsten und Großschutzgebiete Mecklenburg-Vorpommern|url= http://www.nationalpark-vorpommersche-boddenlandschaft.de/vbl/publikationen/ba.pdf|format=PDF |sprache= |titel= Nationalparkplan - Bestandsanalyse |werk= |seiten=209 |datum=2002 |zugriff=11 November 2009}} * {{internetquelle |autor= |hrsg= Landesamt für Forsten und Großschutzgebiete Mecklenburg-Vorpommern|url= http://www.nationalpark-vorpommersche-boddenlandschaft.de/vbl/publikationen/luz.pdf|format=PDF |sprache= |titel= Nationalparkplan - Leitbild und Ziele |werk= |seiten=76 |datum=2002 |zugriff=11 November 2009}} * Frank Gnoth-Austen, Rudolf Specht: ''Jasmund, Vorpommersche Boddenlandschaft.'' Vehling, Werl 1995, ISBN 3-536-00476-8 (Deutsche Nationalparke, Vol. 2). * Norbert Rosing, Sarah Fuchs, Klaus Nigge: ''Deutsche Nationalparks.'' Tecklenborg, Steinfurt 1997, ISBN 3-924044-29-5. ==External links== {{Commons category|Nationalpark Vorpommersche Boddenlandschaft|Nationalpark Vorpommersche Boddenlandschaft}} *[http://www.nationalpark-vorpommersche-boddenlandschaft.de Official website of the Western Pomerania Lagoon Area National Park] {{de icon}} * {{DNB-Portal|10055791-0|TYP=Literature about}} * {{LBMV PPN|25156911X}} {{National parks of Germany}} {{Pomerania}} [[Category:National parks of Germany]] [[Category:Protected areas of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern]] [[Category:Protected areas established in 1990]] [[Category:Fischland-Darss-Zingst]] [[Category:Lagoons of Germany]] [[Category:1990 establishments in East Germany]] {{VorpommernRügen-geo-stub}} {{Europe-protected-area-stub}}
